jobDescription: Company Overview:  Screenvision Media is a national leader in cinema advertising, offering on-screen advertising, in-lobby promotions and integrated marketing programs to national, regional and local advertisers and providing comprehensive cinema advertising representation services for its theatrical exhibitor partners. The ideal candidate will have established relationships with federal government agencies regarding marketing and grant programs.
